divs: Sighting DetailsComing home from buying a pack of cigaretts. Noticed large white stationary object in the night sky. At first glance I thought it was a blimp. After I parked my car, I decided to take a second look. It didn't move at all, and it definitely wasn,t a blimp or plane. I then called out to my wife and kids to come and look at the object. Approx. 1 to two minutes later we saw a small white object fall from the larger one. I then ran to get our small telescope, hoping to get a better view. When I came back, I noticed the smaller object was now stationary to the right of the larger object. I coudln't get a better view of the object with the telescope (just looked fuzzy through the lense), so I contined to watch it for about another 10 mins. My wife and kids had already gone back inside. I then went inside my home to go get my cellphone, hoping to take a picture of it. When I came out, both objects were gone. I'll tell you, I've never seen anything like that before. I was excited and slightly nervous at the same time.
Summary: Large white oval shaped object with smaller white object(s) dropping from larger object
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Carson
There were no other sightings in Carson on or around April 18th 2008
